title: ðŸ“¬ Mailbag Monday: What if Manning was on the Pats and Brady was on the Colts? (Football 6/8)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough for another edition of 'Mailbag Monday'. First, the guys get the answer to a question that bugged them in last week's mailbag. The Pick Six Superfriends also discuss a possible change to the NFL's schedule release, a hypothetical where Tom Brady and Peyton Manning swap teams, Brinson's Twitter hiatus and Danny Dimes. Lastly, they give out more workout advice to middle schoolers for some reason.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS @johnbreech, @seanjwagner

Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough for another edition of 'Mailbag Monday'. First, the guys get the answer to a question that bugged them in last week's mailbag. The Pick Six Superfriends also discuss a possible change to the NFL's schedule release, a hypothetical where Tom Brady and Peyton Manning swap teams, Brinson's Twitter hiatus and Danny Dimes. Lastly, they give out more workout advice to middle schoolers for some reason.
